user_query: I want to plan a trip with my friends and search for available trips between Ljubljana and Vienna.

TaskList.description: Search for available trips between Ljubljana and Vienna on 16.02.2022.
Retrieve the timetable for the available trips found in Subtask 1.
Obtain the fares in EUR for the trips selected in Subtask 2.
Fetch the latitude and longitude for Ljubljana.
Fetch the latitude and longitude for Vienna.
